CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( "https://"&IF( CONTAINS(breadwinner_qbo__QBO_Org_Name__c , "Sandbox Company"), "sandbox." ,"") &"qbo.intuit.com/app/"& CASE( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c,
'Bill', "bill?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c)-FIND('-Bill-', breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c) - 5)),
'Purchase Order',"purchaseorder?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c)-FIND('-PO-', breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c)- 3)),
"vendorcredit?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c)-FIND('-VC-', breadwinner_qbo__BillPO_Id__c)- 3)) ), "Click Here" )
CustomField.label: See this Bill / PO in QuickBooks Online
